title: I dawngdah mai em ni? Hnathawh tur a awm
lyrics:
I dawngdah mai em ni? Hnathawh tur a awm,
Lalpa huanah i tan hmun a la awm e;
Rawngbawltu rinawm tak nih peih fo langin,
Lalpa kohnaah che chuan pui thuai ang che.

Tanpui la, tanpui la, tanpui thuai langin,
Chauvin an tlu dawn e, tanpui thuai ang che;
Tanpui la, tanpui la, tanpui thuai langin,
Isuan a koh chhung hian tanpui thuai ta che.

I aw a reh em ni? Hla sak tur a awm,
Ama fak hla sain lo zai nawn leh la;
Tuipui leh ram tin chunga a darh hma chuan,
Van hmun i thlen thlengin bang lovin bei la.

Khawngaihna chang turin i tawngtai ngai em,
Vakvaiten amah an zui theihna dilin?
Boralna ata tawngtaiin a chhan thei,
Vawiin hi i chhand
am theihna ni a ni.
